cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an unknown enum 'maybe' will cause configuration parsing failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the uplink carrier bandwidth to 1000 PRBs exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation error.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行載波帶寬設定為 1000 PRB 超過最大允許值，會導致配置驗證錯誤。
